Documentation¶

project.add_2(a)[source]¶

Add 2 to a number

>>> add_2(3)
5
>>> add_2(5)
7
Parameters:a (int) – Number to add
Returns:
Return type:int, value a+2
project.hello()[source]¶

Returns “Hello, world!”

project.is_even(val)[source]¶

Returns True if the input number is even, False if it’s odd

>>> is_even(4)
True
>>> is_even(17)
False
Parameters:val (int) – Number to evaluate
Returns:
Return type:boolean, True if val is even, False if val is odd
